title: Saturn Transit in the 6th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting the 6th house for Sagittarius ascendant strengthens discipline in work, health, and conflict management. This phase demands sustained effort in daily routines and professional responsibilities. Challenges from competition, debts, or obligations require patience and methodical handling. Health improves through structured habits rather than quick fixes. Success comes by confronting issues directly, maintaining consistency, and building resilience through service and accountability.

sections.heading: Conflicts & Competition
points: Legal or debt matters need structure

closing: This transit rewards persistence and responsibility. Facing challenges steadily transforms pressure into durable strength.
